clarification: By ”approval” we mean both explicit approval, such as through a vote of confidence, and tacit approval, such as a practice stating that the head of state has to have majority support (or should not be opposed by the majority) in the legislature even though no vote is taken on his/her appointment. We are not concerned with certification of electoral college votes (as in the US, Mexico).
ordering: Answer this question only for those years you selected 1-5 on question v2expathhs.
name: v2exaphos
